function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High abundance of Deinococcus in building dust and mechanically ventilated offices.","Impact":"Potential for indoor environmental conditions that support the growth of harmful microbial taxa.","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and maintenance of ventilation systems, monitoring of indoor humidity levels, and use of UV light disinfection.","Technologies":"UV light disinfection systems, humidity monitoring devices, and air quality testing equipment.","People":"Occupants of buildings with mechanically ventilated offices.","Owner":"Building management and maintenance staff."},{"Description":"Limited understanding of the relationship between indoor microbial ecology and human health implications.","Impact":"Potential for negative health impacts from indoor microbial biodiversity.","Mitigation":"Investing in research to better understand the relationship, promoting regular indoor air quality testing, and implementing measures to control indoor microbial growth.","Technologies":"Indoor air quality testing equipment, microbiome analysis tools, and microbial control technologies.","People":"Occupants of indoor spaces.","Owner":"Public health organizations, building owners, and researchers."},{"Description":"Lack of knowledge about the impact of indoor microbial taxa on human health.","Impact":"Uncertainty about the potential health effects of indoor microbial exposure.","Mitigation":"Conducting research to identify the impact of different microbial taxa on human health, promoting effective indoor hygiene practices, and implementing microbial control measures.","Technologies":"Microbiome analysis tools, microbial control technologies, and education on indoor hygiene practices.","People":"Occupants of indoor spaces.","Owner":"Public health organizations, researchers, and building owners."}]}
